Question & Options:
Which characters are related to the Armitage family in *Get Out*?
Options:
A. A) Allison Williams as Rose Armitage
B. B) Caleb Landry Jones as Jeremy Armitage
C. C) Lakeith Stanfield as Andre Hayworth / Logan King
D. D) Richard Herd as Roman Armitage
Correct Answer: A) Allison Williams as Rose Armitage, B) Caleb Landry Jones as Jeremy Armitage, D) Richard Herd as Roman Armitage

Question & Options:
Which of the following statements accurately describe the relationships among the characters in *Get Out*?
Options:
A. A) Allison Williams and Caleb Landry Jones play siblings in the film.
B. B) Lakeith Stanfield's character has a connection to Caleb Landry Jones' character due to a missing person case.
C. C) Marcus Henderson's character is revealed to be someone else entirely.
D. D) All of the above

Which characters in *Get Out* are involved in the transformation of Andre Hayworth into Logan King?
Options:
A. A) Caleb Landry Jones
B. B) Lakeith Stanfield
C. C) Richard Herd
D. D) Marcus Henderson
Correct Answer: B) Lakeith Stanfield, C) Richard Herd
